title: November2008 'W' Magazine Type
content:
Despite my best efforts in trying to identify this typeface I have failed and need help. I particularly enjoy the Uppercase 'G', and how it relates to the lowercase 'e'.

Thank-You in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017032522im_/http:/typophile.com/files/W_November08_Type_5310.jpg)
author: IanCrombie

comments.content: I don't know this one, but you might like [FS Alvar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017032522/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontsmith/fs_alvar_family_ot/).
Nice But not quite what I was looking for. Thank you for the recommendation.
It's [Lynda](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017032522/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0220) designed by Ariel Di Lisio and digitized by Alejandro Paul
